## Why Archived?

These manual API documentation files have been replaced by **Scribe auto-generated documentation** which is:
- ‚úÖ Always up-to-date with code
- ‚úÖ Auto-generated from PHPDoc + FormRequests
- ‚úÖ Interactive with "Try it out" feature
- ‚úÖ Exportable to Postman + OpenAPI

## New Documentation Location

**Live Docs:** `/docs` endpoint (http://localhost:8089/docs or https://www.danzafacile.it/docs)

**Generated Files:**
- `public/docs/index.html` - Interactive HTML documentation
- `public/docs/collection.json` - Postman collection
- `public/docs/openapi.yaml` - OpenAPI 3.0 specification

### API_ENDPOINTS.md (8.7KB)

## Migration Notes

If you need to reference old documentation for historical purposes:
- All endpoints are now documented in Scribe
- PHPDoc annotations provide better detail
- Regenerate docs with: `php artisan scribe:generate`

**Maintainer:** DanzaFacile Development Team
